23 // ===========================================================================
24 class MDPSimulator : public SIMULATOR
25 {
26  public:
27  // =================================================================
28  // Public Constructor/Destructor
29  // =================================================================
34  MDPSimulator(MDP* mdp_, double gamma) : SIMULATOR(), mdp(mdp_)
35  {
36  // Check errors
37  assert(mdp_);
38  assert((gamma > 0.0) && (gamma <= 1.0));
39 
40 
41  unsigned int nX = mdp->getNbStates();
42  unsigned int nU = mdp->getNbActions();
43  const std::vector<double>& RV = mdp->getR();
44 
45  NumObservations = nX;
46  NumActions = nU;
47  Discount = gamma;
48  rsas = true;
49 
50  std::vector<std::vector<double>::const_iterator > maxList;
51  maxList = utils::search::max<vector<double> >(
52  RV.begin(), RV.end());
53  RewardRange = *(maxList[0]);
54 
55  T = 0;
56  R = new double[nX*nU*nX];
57  for (unsigned int x = 0; x < nX; ++x)
58  for (unsigned int u = 0; u < nU; ++u)
59  for (unsigned int y = 0; y < nX; ++y)
60  R[nX*nU*x + nX*u + y] = RV[nX*nU*x + nX*u + y];
61  }
62 
63 
73  MDPSimulator(unsigned int iniState_,
74  unsigned int nX, unsigned int nU,
75  std::vector<double> RV, double gamma) :
76  SIMULATOR(), mdp(0), iniState(iniState_)
77  {
78  // Check errors
79  assert(iniState_ < nX);
80  assert(nX > 0);
81  assert(nU > 0);
82  assert(RV.size() == (nX * nU * nX));
83  assert((gamma > 0.0) && (gamma <= 1.0));
84 
85 
86  NumObservations = nX;
87  NumActions = nU;
88  Discount = gamma;
89  rsas = true;
90 
91  std::vector<std::vector<double>::const_iterator > maxList;
92  maxList = utils::search::max<vector<double> >(
93  RV.begin(), RV.end());
94  RewardRange = *(maxList[0]);
95 
96  T = 0;
97  R = new double[nX*nU*nX];
98  for (unsigned int x = 0; x < nX; ++x)
99  for (unsigned int u = 0; u < nU; ++u)
100  for (unsigned int y = 0; y < nX; ++y)
101  R[nX*nU*x + nX*u + y] = RV[nX*nU*x + nX*u + y];
102  }
103 
104 
108  virtual ~MDPSimulator()
109  {
110  if (mdp) { delete mdp; }
111  delete[] R;
112  }
113 
114 
115  // =================================================================
116  // Public methods
117  // =================================================================
118  uint CreateStartState() const
119  {
120  if (mdp) { return mdp->getIniState(); }
121  else { return iniState; }
122  }
123 
124 
125  bool Step(uint state, uint action, uint& observation, double& reward)
126  const
127  {
128  if (mdp == 0)
129  throw std::runtime_error("Unable to simulate the MDP!");
130 
131  else
132  {
133  assert(state == mdp->getCurrentState());
134 
135  unsigned int y;
136  mdp->perform((unsigned int) action, y, reward);
137  observation = (uint) y;
138 
139 
140  return false;
141  }
142  }
143 
144 
145  private:
146  // =================================================================
147  // Private attributes
148  // =================================================================
152  MDP* mdp;
153 
154 
158  unsigned int iniState;
159 };
